ygData.subject: RE: Galtin's late night adventure in Unrest
ygData.msgSnippet: Genni is the least of my problems for now:-)  I have yet to get a lambent stone plus I m broke so can t buy any of the jewels.  By the time I get the money for
ygData.messageBody:
Genni is the least of my problems for now:-) I have yet to get a lambent
stone plus I'm broke so can't buy any of the jewels. By the time I get the
money for the jewels, hopefully Genni will be fixed. I've spent most of my
playing time recently trying to get quest components. I figure by the time
I acquire most of the quest components, I will be high enough level to start
fighting giants and griffons. Will kill two birds with one stone and get
the lambent stones plus cash all with the same mob.

Galtin of E'ci

> -----Original Message-----
> From: kim@... [SMTP:kim@...]
> Sent: Friday, October 22, 1999 10:21 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Galtin's late night adventure in Unrest
>
> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Fri, 22 Oct 1999, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> > was looking forward to finally killing one. The GDB we killed didn't
> drop a
> > bracelet and it was getting late so I camped without getting a bracelet.
> > Looking forward to trying again though:-)
>
> You can't do the bracer quest without Genni anyway.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
